Question 2 NFL in 2022

```{r}
NFL2022_stuffs <- (read_csv('https://bcdanl.github.io/data/NFL2022_stuffs.csv'))
```

Q2a

```{r}
q2a <- NFL2022_stuffs(na.rm=TRUE)
```

Q2b

```{r}
q2b <- q2a %>% 
  group_by(posteam) %>% 
  summarize(passes=mean(pass)) %>% 
  
```

Q2c

```{r}
ggplot(q2b)+
  geom_point(aes(x=pass,y=team))

#the mean value of pass increases as number of posessions increases
```

Q2d

```{r}
NFL2022_epa <- read_csv('https://bcdanl.github.io/data/NFL2022_epa.csv')

NFL2022_stuffs_EPA <- join_by(NFL2022_stuffs, NFL2022_stuffs_EPA(na.rm=T))
```

Q2e

```{r}
ggplot(NFL2022_stuffs_EPA(aes(x=week,y=epa)), color=passer)+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()
```

Q2f

```{r}
q2q <- NFL2022_stuffs_EPA %>% 
  group_by(mean(epa))
```
